title: Complete Web Development - DELTA
description: Learn Web Development from scratch with this comprehensive course. Master front-end and back-end technologies including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build responsive websites and full-stack web applications.

title: Java with DSA - ALPHA
description: Learn Java programming and Data Structures & Algorithms from scratch. Master Java syntax, OOP concepts, and DSA topics including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and sorting algorithms.

title: C++ With DSA
description: Learn C++ programming and Data Structures & Algorithms from scratch. Master C++ syntax, OOP concepts, and DSA topics including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs, and sorting algorithms.

title: Data Science & Analytics
description: Master data analysis techniques using Python, SQL, and visualization tools. Learn statistical methods, data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, and how to communicate insights effectively to drive business decisions.

title: GATE - CSE & IT
description: Prepare for the GATE Computer Science & Information Technology exam with this comprehensive course. Cover the entire GATE syllabus, practice with previous year papers, and get expert guidance from top educators.
